Posts.Content: Jun 16, 2009 09:47PM Tabb2000 wrote: Hi Carol- I had chemo before surgery.  After 4 rounds of Taxol and 4 rounds of A/C, there were still live cancer cells in 2 out of 16 lymph nodes.  My Dr. told me that chemo only kills all cancer cells in 5% of cases. Chemo works more effectively on triple negative patients.  Your path looks similar to mine. I also had ultrasound to my armpit area and they saw nothing suspicious and were surprised that 2 came back positive.  You really can never be sure.  Best bet would be to take some more out.  Just my opionion. Good Luck!
Posts.Title: Happy I went for second opinion !!! Mamita49 KerryMac
